## Color3.copyFromFloats() method

Updates the Color3 rgb values from the given floats

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
copyFromFloats(r: number, g: number, b: number): Color3;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  r | <code>number</code> | defines the red component to read from |
|  g | <code>number</code> | defines the green component to read from |
|  b | <code>number</code> | defines the blue component to read from |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Color3`

the current Color3 object
